job_info.title: Software Engineer - AI Agents (Agentic AI)
job_info.location: Mountain View, CA / New York, NY
job_info.description:
Build AI agents that can reason, plan, and take actions to accomplish user goals.
                Work on the future of human-AI interaction.
requirements: Experience building AI agents or autonomous systems
Experience with LLMs and prompt engineering
Experience with tool use and function calling

highlights: NeurIPS 2025 CureBench Global 2nd Place - AI Agent development
CureAgent framework, Executor-Analyst architecture, tool-augmented reasoning
Deployed Ollama, llama.cpp, vllm, TensorRT-LLM, mlc-llm
